The matrix multiplication algorithm multiplies two given matrices.

Input: Two square matrtices \( A, B \) of dimension n
Output: Square matrix \( C \)
Test of correctness:     The resulting matrix \( C \) is correct iff for each element \( c_{ij} \) the following equation holds: $$ c_{ij} = \sum_{k=1}^n a_{ik} b_{kj} $$
Implementation: To implement a matrix multipliaction algorithm the author has to write a java class extending the BasicMatrixMulAbsAlgorithm class and implementing its execute(int [][] A, int [][] B, int [][] C) method.
